Name: Absinthe Sour
Ingredients: 10 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
15 ml Egg white (pasteurised) or 																																			Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer
2 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters optional
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist & Luxardo Maraschino Cherry .
Review: A touch of the sours for absinthe lovers.
Nutrition: One serving of Absinthe Sour contains 141 calories
